vulnerability.name: USN-4051-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4051-1 fixed a vulnerability in apport. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   Kevin Backhouse discovered a race-condition when reading the user's local  Apport configuration. This could be used by a local attacker to cause  Apport to include arbitrary files in a resulting crash report.

statements.status_notes: Apport could be made to expose sensitive information in crash reports. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
